short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts .webp images to .png when copying them to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click those pesky annoying webp images, and litterally "Copy as PNG" to your clipboard.
Some other extentions allow to "Save as PNG" but that's not what I was looking for.
So I created my own extention.

Believe it or not, I can not code.  The entire code was done on ChatGPT 4 with about 30 minutes of debugging.  CRAZY IKR!

I hope this little extention helps someone out there.

Enjoy!
